results.name: a(n) = (3*n)^2.
comment: Number of edges of the complete tripartite graph of order 6n, K_n, n, 4n. - _Roberto E. Martinez II_, Jan 07 2002
Area of a square with side 3n. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Sep 24 2014
link: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-3,1).
formula: a(n) = a(n-1) + 9*(2*n-1) for n>0, a(0)=0. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 19 2010
xref: Numbers of the form 9n^2 + kn, for integer n: this sequence (k = 0), A132355 (k = 2), A185039 (k = 4), A057780 (k = 6), A218864 (k = 8). - _Jason Kimberley_, Nov 09 2012
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
